testimonials.name: Yatwan Hui
testimonials.title: Beela Mentee
testimonials.description: I loved the Beela Pollination Programme's focus on immigrant women in Sweden transitioning into tech. This was a clear thread in all of the workshops so that even well-trodden topics like CV writing were much more tailored to our specific needs. It's also exciting to see the programme grow, adapt and experiment with new ideas such as getting involved in real-life projects to practice our new skills.

testimonials.name: Francisca Alliende
testimonials.title: Beela Mentee then Mentor - Data Analyst
testimonials.description: When I arrived in Stockholm, I was new to Sweden and looking for a tech job for the first time, I felt insecure, lost and unmotivated, until I joined the Beela mentorship program as a mentee, which helped me better understand the Swedish job market and feel accompanied in this process and soon after that I found a job! Now I am a mentor in Beela and I want to continue participating as much as I can in this wonderful network.

testimonials.name: Yi Li
testimonials.title: Beela Mentor - UX Designer
testimonials.description: I like how we help each other and grow together in Beela. The journey has brought me new reflections, inspirations and many motivations.

testimonials.name: Akzharkyn Duisembiyeva
testimonials.title: Beela Mentor - Security Engineer
testimonials.description: Beela programme gave me a chance to get to know so many people that are willing to support each other. As a mentor I have met truly inspiring, smart and brave people who are finding their way to Swedish tech field. While mentees can learn from my technical experience, I can also talk to people from various backgrounds and improve my own skills and knowledge.

testimonials.name: Rachael Ahn
testimonials.title: Beela Mentor - Data Scientist
testimonials.description: Beela's mentorship program allowed me to connect with other immigrant women in Sweden and prompt meaningful discussions about data, adjusting to a new culture, self-assurance in applying for jobs and more. Highly recommend others entering the tech industry to join the Beela community and especially the mentorship program to grow your network.
